title: Kayle disappeared
body: I was playing TFT just now and during one of my matches, my Kayle disappeared from my map.  I had all 6 nobles and for some reason I kept the noble buff in the next round, where Kayle's spot was filled with the next character on my bench.  I didn't get her ult or attacks though, and I proceeded to lose.  Hopefully this can be fixed soon!

replies.body: this just happened to me too, also with a kayle. she was keeping me alive in the game with my 3hp but she disappeared so i lost.
Same thing happened to me.  Had a 3-star Vayne that disappeared.  Didn't accidentally sell her because all her items were gone too.  She shows up on the post game lobby too.
